pageContext.claim: “And so we are working very closely with Mexico, very, very closely with Canada. The relationship has never been better.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S.-Mexico relationship has been strained for much of Trump’s presidency over immigration and trade issues. Officials were hopeful in January that the USMCA would ease tensions, but the relationship is far from the best it’s ever been. Moreover, several Canadian politicians have blasted President Trump’s decisions relating to Canada during the coronavirus pandemic.
